description:
The Kishin and the Grim Reaper tear into each other with unimaginable levels of power. Before this ultimate clash between good and evil concludes, great sacrifices will be made.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Death Scythe o Motta Shinigami-sama: Issun Saki wa Yami Darake?
Der Shinigami-sama mit seiner Death Scythe
La falce della morte del Sommo Shinigami. Che cosa ci riserva il domani?
Lord Death Wields a Death Scythe: Just One Step from Utter Darkness?
Maitre Shinigami armé de sa Death Scythe ! Futur incertain ?
武器[デスサイズ]を持った死神様 ~一寸先はヤミだらけ?~
